description: Order of universal Chevalley group B_7(q), q = prime power.
references: J. H. Conway, R. T. Curtis, S. P. Norton, R. A. Parker and R. A. Wilson, ATLAS of Finite Groups. Oxford Univ. Press, 1985, p. xvi.
H. S. M. Coxeter and W. O. J. Moser, Generators and Relations for Discrete Groups, 4th ed., Springer-Verlag, NY, reprinted 1984, p. 131.
formula: a(n) = B(A000961(n + 1), 7) where B(q,n) is defined in A003920. - _Sean A. Irvine_, Sep 22 2015
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
